String.string: Speak with {@LinkCreature:76#1040#Kaia} at Kanstria. (Press to use the teleport scroll you received.)
You have found a teleportal which leads to Shandra Manaya.

Go to the Queen's Lair Entrance, found near the northeast teleport platform in Granarkus. [Use the {@LinkCreature:76#1007#Teleportal} or purchase a teleportal scroll from the specialty store to go to Queen's Lair Entrance.]
Enter Manaya's Core. [You must select Manaya's Core (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:250#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Defeat Empowered Hulrap Warden and find the queen's chamber.
Defeat {@LinkCreature:3011#42702#Akatran} and find the queen's chamber.
The passage to the queen's chamber opened.
Go through the Passage to the Queen's Chamber to reach Manaya's Core.
Eliminate Shandra Manaya, the argon queen, in Manaya's Core.
Tell Kaia you killed Shandra Manaya.
